articles.author: Hanna Erdmann
articles.title: FAST: This acronym could help save a life - WKBN.com
articles.description: Sunday is World Stroke Day, and the American Heart Association says it’s important to know the signs, as it can be a matter of life or death.
articles.content:
BOARDMAN, Ohio (WKBN) — Sunday is World Stroke Day, and the American Heart Association says it’s important to know the signs, as it can be a matter of life or death.
A stroke can happen to anyone. I… [+2193 chars]
